Class Screen

java.lang.Object

public class Screen
extends NetObject
The base .NET class managing System.Windows.Forms.Screen, System.Windows.Forms, Version=5.0.1.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089. Extends NetObject.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Windows.Forms.Screen
